description:
http://anidb.net/ch114792 [Sei] begins her magic training in earnest, tutored by none other than http://anidb.net/ch114790 [the Grand Magus] himself. http://anidb.net/ch114788 [Commander Hawke] and http://anidb.net/ch116693 [Liz] assist Sei with learning how to be ladylike.
Source: Funimation
